page.title: 15SHERIFFHALES-PARISH CHURCH
page.content: The Parish Church in Sheriffhales belongs to the Church of England and is dedicated to St. Mary the Virgin. The church was considerably added to in 1661 with stone taken from Lilleshall Abbey. The tower has a peal of 6 bells and was built around 1721. Inside the church the glasswork is of particular interest. The main churchyard and burial ground is found across the road from the main church and here can be found a medieval cross which was restored after World War 1 as a war memorial.
